item.title: US-54 South/US-70 West at US-82 and Relief Route
item.description: US-54 South/US-70 West at US-82 and Alamogordo Relief Route. Turn left for US-82 east to Cloudcroft. Turn right to continue on US-54 South/US-70 West to Las Cruces and El Paso (Alamogordo Relief Route). Continue straight for White Sands Blvd. and downtown Alamogordo. This is the western end of US-82.

item.title: US-54 South/US-70 West Approaching US-82
item.description: US-54 South/US-70 West approaching US-82 and Alamogordo Relief Route junction.

item.title: US-82 East at 17th St.
item.description: US-82 east at 17th St., the truck around around Lovington. Turn right for NM-18 South/NM-83 East truck route; turn left for US-82 east truck route. Entering Lovington, New Mexico. Lovington is the seat of Lea County.

item.title: US-82 East Approaching Truck Route
item.description: US-82 east approaching truck route around the city of Lovington. Turn right on 17th St. for the NM-18/NM-83 truck route. Turn left on 17th St. for the US-82 truck route.

item.title: US-82 East at NM-238 South
item.description: US-82 east at NM-238 south.

item.title: US-82 East Approaching NM-238
item.description: US-82 east approaching NM-238 south.

item.title: End NM-457 South at US-380
item.description: End NM-457 south at US-82. Turn right for US-82 west to Artesia; left for US-82 east to Lovington.

item.title: End NM-457 South at US-82
item.description: End NM-457 south at US-82. Turn right on US-82 west to Artesia; left on US-82 east to Lovington.

item.title: NM-457 South at US-82
item.description: NM-457 south at US-82. Turn right on US-82 (west) for Artesia; left on US-82 (east) for Lovington.

item.title: US-82 East at US-285
item.description: US-82 east at US-285. Turn right on US-285 south for Carlsbad; left on US-285 north to Roswell; straight on US-82 east for Lovington.

item.title: US-82 East Approaching US-285
item.description: US-82 east approaching US-285 junction in Artesia.

item.title: US-82 East - Distance Marker
item.description: Distance marker on US-82 east, leaving Hope, NM. Distance to Artesia, and Lovington. The text on this distance marker is centred instead of the typical left aligned.

item.title: US-82 East - Eddy County Line
item.description: Eddy County Line on US-82 east.

item.title: US-82 East at NM-13
item.description: US-82 east at NM-13 to Roswell and Hagerman. Continue east on US-82 to Artesia.

item.title: US-82 East at NM-24
item.description: US-82 east at NM-24 south to Dunken. Continue east on US-82 for Artesia.

item.title: US-82 East Approaching NM-24
item.description: US-82 east approaching NM-24 junction, in rural Chaves County.

item.title: End NM-244 South at US-82
item.description: End NM-244 south at US-82. Turn right on US-82 for Alamogordo and Cloudcroft; turn left on US-82 for Mayhill and Snow Canyon.

item.title: US-82 East at NM-244
item.description: US-82 east at NM-244. Turn left for NM-244 north to Mescalero, Ruidoso, and Silver Lake.

item.title: US-82 East at NM-130
item.description: US-82 east at NM-130 junction in Cloudcroft.

item.title: US-82 East - Distance Marker
item.description: Distance marker on US-82 east, leaving Alamogordo. Distance to Cloudcroft, Mayhill, and Artesia.

item.title: US-82 East
item.description: First reassurance marker on US-82 east.

item.title: White Sands Blvd. North at US-54/US-70/US-82
item.description: White Sands Blvd. north at US-54/US-70/US-82 junction. Turn right for US-82 east; left for US-54 South/US-70 West; straight for US-54 North/US-70 East.

item.title: White Sands Blvd. North at US-54/US-70/US-82
item.description: White Sands Blvd. North at US-54/US-70/US-82 in Alamogordo. Turn left for US-54 South/US-70 West/Relief Route/Las Cruces/El Paso. Turn right for US-82/Cloudcroft. Continue straight for US-54 North/US-70 East/Tularosa. This is the northern end of the Alamogordo Relief Route. This is also the western terminus of US-82.

item.title: US-54 North at US-70 - Alamogordo Relief Route
item.description: US-54 north at US-70. Turn right to access US-82/Cloudcroft (via Alamogordo Relief Route).
